text: Tomara bala, amara imana enechi allahara upara ebam ya abatirna hayeche amadera prati ebam ya abatirna hayeche ibrahima, isama'ila, isahaka, iyakuba ebam tadiya bansadharera prati ebam musa, isa, an'yan'ya nabike palanakartara paksa theke ya dana kara hayeche, tatsamudayera upara. Amara tadera madhye parthakya kari na. Amara tamra'i anugatyakari.
